data.name: Alienate! (A Trivia Game)
data.detailed_description:
Alienate! (A Trivia Game) is a party game for 2 to 12 players set on an Alien Game Show Ship in the not-so-distant future. Players must work together to answer trivia questions - but there’s a catch! Some players only earn points when the group answers incorrectly, so misdirection is key. So work with your teammates, but trust no one and see if you have what it takes to win the big showcase... Planet Earth!


PLEASE NOTE: Alienate! is a local multiplayer game that can also be played with remote players online (VERY easily). One player can purchase the game and their friends can join the fun via the "Game Code". It's perfect for Online Game Nights, Community Game Streams, Virtual Happy Hours, etc.!

data.short_description: Alienate! is a social deduction trivia game for 2 to 12 players. Each player is either an Alien competing to win the BIG SHOWCASE (Planet Earth) on a Space Game Show - or an Earthling, who infiltrated the game show in an effort to save their planet. Over 200 trivia questions with

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core or Greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1+
  • Processor: 2.33 GHz Quad Core or Greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
